name: JoAnna Johnston
what_you_do: Joanna Ingram is a Brand Messaging Specialist who helps visionary women unlock their next-level income and reignite their passion for their clients and offers through her unique Brand EPICS® process.
who_you_serve: Established, talented, and intuitive coaches and healers who've been playing small and hiding their unique brilliance while working with misaligned and draining clients.
seeking: Established, talented, and intuitive coaches and healers who want to sell their offers to premium clients at higher prices by articulating the value of their transformational work to successfully uplevel and reposition themselves within their industry.
offering: Joanna Ingram offers to support clients to shift into their exciting next level through her unique Brand EPICS® process.
social_proof: Joanna Ingram has over 20 years of experience as an Advertising Agency Director and is a 5/1 Reflector and Intuition-Led Potter.
business_focus: Helping visionary women unlock their next-level income and reignite their passion for their clients and offers through her unique Brand EPICS® process.
service_provided: Brand messaging, intuitive coaching, business energetics, client attraction, premium positioning
